marklogic.body: I really enjoy the slow Burn...in fact, I watched the entire 1st season in a weekend marathon before the premiere last night and in retrospect it was fantastic. Sure, there were some slips and ticks and it wasn't perfection. With that said, the was Spot on and the characters were compelling. This reminds me of Twin Peaks and who killed Laura Palmer, something fans didn't find out about until the movie. SO, I will take this series and enjoy the slow Burn and watch some excellent Acting in the process.
